name: Kid Soldier PC Advance 4 Prototype Demo
name_original: Kid Soldier PC Advance 4 Prototype Demo
description:
Kid Soldier & the Military troop cats in 4th iteration PC Advance 4

Takeshi's Iconic Explosive Crossover action game series has return. 

#Kidsoldier PCA 4 is the 4th Installment of the #KidSoldier PCA series and the game is the 10th Anniversary of the Kid Soldier franchise. features all the characters from the #heathcliff and the catillac cats cartoons and 5 levels of stage 0. 

Player 1 Key Board Controls

Move L.Arrow or R.Arrow Key: Movement

Tap S: Melee

Tap S (While in the Air): Air Melee

Hold S Key : Shoot

Move Any Arrow Key while Holding S: Run and Shoot

Tap Any Arrow Key and S: Smash Attack

L.Arrow and R.Arrow+S or R.Arrow & L.Arrow+S: Breakout Blitz

D Key: Jump

D Key 2 times: Jump Attack

UP Arrow & D: Rising Upper Attack

2 PLAYER CO-OP ONLY HAS 1 LEVEL IN STAGE 0.

2 PLAYER CONTROLS (NUMLOCK RECOMMEND):

4 6 8 5: MOVEMENT

H: SPECIAL MOVES

4 OR 6 H: SECOND SPECIAL MOVE

PRESS J: MELEE 

PRESS J: AIR MELEE (ONLY IN THE AIR)

HOLD J: SHOOT

ANY NUMLOCK ARROW KEY: MOVE AND SHOOT

TAP 4+ J  OR 6+J: SMASH ATTACKS

K: Jump: Jump

K (2 Times): Double Jump
